rules_text:
{X}, {T}: Put X charge counters on Bonehewn Geistkiln.
{T}, Remove X charge counters from Bonehewn Geistkiln: Return target creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. [i](If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)[/i]
